<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get the reassignment progress"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/2.0/people/reassign/progress"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Returns the progress of the started data reassignment for the user with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"userId":{"description":"User ID whose data is reassigned","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Reassignment progress","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","title":"ReassignProgressItem"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
